column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The sprightly Loporrit has lost track of their friends, and could use a helping hand.
Search for and aid wayward Loporrits.
Search for more wayward Loporrits.
Speak with the reeling Loporrit.
Report to the sprightly Loporrit.
You're that visitor everyone's been talking about. I don't suppose you have time to assist me in a matter of life and death?
Four of my friends went out to patrol the moon and mine for ore. They should be back by now, but... Well, I'm worried something happened!
I can't say I'm too keen on the idea of coming face-to-facelike-growth with one of those roving fungi by myself, though. Could you come along? Please come along...
Thank you! Let's hop to it, then. My friends were headed toward the Chlorophosgrot.
Sweet Mother Hydaelyn! I hope they're all right...
...Guh? Wha? Why are you...?
I-I'm not slacking! I, erm...passed out after a weeper ambushed me. Yes, that's definitely what happened.

If you're looking for the others, they went ahead to survey the Chlorophosgrot and the area around the Cradle of Darkness. I'd get them myself, but I'm much too laz─er, that is, exhausted from my encounter with the weeper.
The others are either there in the Chlorophosgrot or near the Cradle of Darkness... I'm sure they're fine, though. They're nowhere near as, uh...exhausted...as I am.
...Do you hear intermittent snoring?
This hole sure is deep. Drop a rock in there, and you'll never hear it hit the bottom...
Oh, it's you! Is something the matter?
Eep! Sorry for the bother─I didn't realize I'd been gone so long. I'll head back right away.
Mining makes me so...so sleepy. Must...stay...awake...
...Hmmm? Oh, is it time to go back already? I hardly got anything done. Oh well!
I'm sure this plant wasn't here last time... Well, would you look at that, it's made my paw all tingly. Numb, even... Surely there's some use for this!
Goodness me! Time to head back, is it? I was so focused, I completely lost track of time.
How far down could that hole go, I wonder?
<yawn> Maybe I'll get some proper mining done next time.
I can't feel my arm now. But it still moves, so it's fine, right? ...Right?
I feel much better after that brief and totally regulation-compliant break. Let's head back and sift through the spoils of our expedition!
I hope they don't think you're impressed by their shenanigans... <sigh> Honestly!
Thanks again for helping me round everyone up. I'm glad no one was hurt...

They were lucky this time, but with those fungi and other odd creatures out there, I think we'll have to reconsider our patrol routes from now on. For a mercy, there are plenty of places to mine for ore nearby.
Before you go, I'd like you to have this. Don't be a stranger!
